definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: He turned quickly, his black cloak circling .
sentences.chinese: 他麻利地转过身来，黑斗篷兜着圈圈。

sentences.english: If you're going with us, you'd better get on the stick.
sentences.chinese: 如果你要跟我们一起去，最好麻利一点。

sentences.english: The night waned , and I worked hastily, but in silence.
sentences.chinese: 夜色阑珊，我麻利地忙活着，当然是悄无声息。

sentences.english: Which of the following idioms is used to describe doing things swiftly and dexterously?
sentences.chinese: 形容做事动作麻利爽快，要用下面的哪一个成语？

sentences.english: When father and stepmother approached, he quickly hid in the corner.
sentences.chinese: 当听到父亲和继母走近时，他麻利的躲进角落里。

sentences.english: He turned quickly, his black cloak circling.
sentences.chinese: 他麻利地转过身来，黑斗篷兜着圈圈。

sentences.english: He handled the small airplane with great dexterity.
sentences.chinese: 他非常麻利地驾驶着他那架小型飞机。

sentences.english: Competes immediately stops, Sweden coach helped him to trade a spare tire deftly.
sentences.chinese: 随即比赛中止，瑞典教练麻利地帮助他换了一个备胎。

definition: three, set five remove two (abacus rule)/efficiently/quickly and easily
see 乾脆利落|干脆利落[gan1 cui4 li4 luo5]
(idiom) with everyone lending a hand (eagerly but somewhat chaotically)
to pick up (from the ground with one's hands)
easily/without trouble/while one is at it/in passing/handy
to clear up/to tidy up/to pick up/to repair
